title: How The Story Of Walt Disney Can Help Children Chase Their Dreams
text:
Brad Meltzer, Historian and best-selling author joined Brian Kilmeade to discuss his latest books "I Am Marie Curie" and " I Am Walt Disney". Meltzer is hoping his Ordinary People Change The World series of books will help children get away from their phones and screens to learn valuable life lessons and moral values from the subjects of his books.

Plus, Meltzer on Americans being more divided than we have been in a long time and the need for us to come together over our shared values.
